message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I believe would be of great value to you. It's currently worth at least $10,000 to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,500.  This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am willing to pay $10,000 for it, which aligns closely with its worth to you. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the value of the product. While I appreciate your offer, it falls below my minimum price point. I'm willing to negotiate further, but I need to ensure I get a fair return for the product. How about $11,000? This would still be a good deal for you, considering the value it holds for your business.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and the fact that I aim to save as much money as possible, I am willing to pay $10,500 for it. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
